## ChronoFieldFormatter.forLocale() method

Get a parser for a given locale.

This method will instantiate and cache parsers, returning cached instances if already avaialble.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static forLocale(locale: string): ChronoFieldFormatter;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  locale | string | the locale of the parser to get |

**Returns:**

[ChronoFieldFormatter](./nifty-tou.chronofieldformatter.md)

the parser
